channel.description: Recent content in Basics on Project Documentations

item.title: Requirements
item.description: Minimun requirements: Untested Recommended specs: TBD Tested devices: CPU: Ryzen 5600 GPU: RTX 3060ti RAM: 32GB Feel free to contact me at alex01763@gmail.com with your specs and fps so that I can improve this page.

item.title: Installation
item.description: You can download the zip files on https://dl.whatthesamuel.com. Extract the contents Locate the executable Play Optional Report any bugs / Request features

item.title: Configuration
item.description: Go to ‘Options’ in the main menu and change the settings as you like.
